title: qcthat structure
text: vignette explains structure {qcthat} framework, outlines files directories added R package running qcthat::qcthat().

title: qcthat structure
text: qualification folder added inst, store specifications file. ./inst/qualification/qualification_specs.csv template file used storing qualification specifications. file modified development team add new specifications needed. qualification developer use file write test cases confirm specifications.

title: qcthat structure
text: testqualification/qualification folder added tests, store test cases/qualification tests. test_qual_T1_1.R template test case shows link test case specification (qualification_specs.csv).

title: qcthat structure
text: Qualification.Rmd template file created minimal dependencies. .Rmd file run qualification tests repository (found filepath ), aggregate results, display basic table showing test results. file can modified fit needs!

title: qcthat structure
text: .github/workflows folder created, store YAML workflow file triggers GitHub Actions. repository pkgdown site, qualification report included vignette default. create pull request targets main branch, release new package version, .pdf qualification report attached release. can fully customized based needs modifying .github/workflows/qualification_report.yaml.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Jeremy Wildfire. Author, maintainer. Matt Roumaya. Author. Gilead Sciences. Copyright holder.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Wildfire J, Roumaya M (2024). qcthat: Lightweight quality control framework R packages used Clinical Trials. R package version 0.1.
code: @Manual{,   title = {qcthat: Lightweight quality control framework for R packages used in Clinical Trials},   author = {Jeremy Wildfire and Matt Roumaya},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1}, }

what: Lightweight quality control framework for R packages used in Clinical Trials
title: Lightweight quality control framework for R packages used in Clinical Trials
text: {qcthat} quality control framework R packages used Clinical Trials. adopted qualification framework used {gsm}. benefit using {qcthat} given basic scaffold build qualification testing strategy R package. includes: qualification testing folder lives inside /tests folder; designed use {testthat}. basic .Rmd report displays results qualification tests. .github/workflows folder includes templated YAML file, automate creation qualification report every new release R package. can easily customized fit needs. Read {qcthat} structure vignette}.

title: Lightweight quality control framework for R packages used in Clinical Trials
text: Contributions welcome! Creating utility package generalizable extensible sorts repository structures challenging, input greatly appreciated. submitting pull request, make sure file issue, generally fall one following categories: Bugfix: something broken. Feature: something wanted needed. QC: documentation metadata incorrect missing. New code generally follow tidyverse style guide.
